summary:
##  What is an MBA?

An MBA (Master of Business Administration) is a graduate degree that teaches you about running a business. It covers topics like marketing, finance, and management. MBAs originated in the United States to help businesses become more efficient. Programs usually take one to two years and can be done full-time, part-time, online, or specifically for working managers (Executive MBAs).  Specializations are often available.
title: Master of Business Administration
